video_info.title: Super Smash 2025/26 Women's
video_info.shortDescription: Auckland Hearts face off against the Northern Brave in a Super Smash showdown at Eden Park Outer Oval. With the third-placed side meeting the fourth, both teams are desperate for victory to break into the top two. Will the Hearts capitalize on home advantage, or can the Brave rise to the challenge away from home? Find out who comes on top as we bring you all the action from the Super Smash 2025/26 Women's, LIVE on Sony LIV.
video_info.longDescription: Auckland Hearts face off against the Northern Brave in a Super Smash showdown at Eden Park Outer Oval. Find out who comes on top as we bring you all the action from the Super Smash 2025/26 Women's, LIVE on Sony LIV.
video_info.episodeTitle: Auckland Hearts vs Northern Brave - 22 Jan 2026
